title: Significant decisions expected as crucial NSC meeting starts
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 24 (APP): A crucial meeting of the National Security Committee started on Thursday under the chair of Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif here at the Prime Minister’s House.
The meeting is expected to take significant decisions in light of the recent situation in the Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu and Kashmir (IIOJK) and India’s unilateral and irresponsible actions.
Senior civil and military leadership is participating in the meeting.
